    Work Experience

    Robotics Intern, ARCBEST technologies, Fort Smith , AR

    Successful Bidirectional Path planning algorithms implementation on vehicle for dynamic environment.

    Worked on localization in known environment using Aruco Tags and odometry using Kalman filter.

    Implemented Pose estimation technique of attachment in order to attach autonomously.

    Simulation of complete warehouse scenario and navigation using ROS and Movebase package.

    May’19 - Present

    Research Assistant, Maryland Robotics Center

    Design and implementation of autonomous Hydroponic system (Cultivation without Substrate) with monitoring of plant health and yield along with cultivation using Robotic End Effectors.

    Sep’18 - Apr’19

    Design Engineer, ACG Worldwide

    Developed “Robotic Pick-and-Place” (3D SCARA of RRP type) resulting in a market revolution; we were the first company in India to have a robotic transfer system. The company showcased this work at ‘P-Mech Exhibition 2018’

    Launched a Special Biscuit transfer attachment for packing 110 biscuits per minute which led to opening of completely new business avenue for ACG in the FMCG market.

    Led ‘Value addition and Value Engineering’ in the Design department which caused a high reduction in overall costs due to the design optimizations.

    Improved o/p efficiency by 15% yielding a record break in the total number of machines produced by the company in Sep’16.

    Jul’16-Aug’18

    Grad. Projects

    Automating robotic solution for last-mile delivery with multiple drones - TSP, Python/C++, ROS, Gazebo/AirSim

    Implementation of path planning algorithms on normal and differential constraints using turtle bot -OpenCV,Python,ROS

    Localization of mobile robot in indoor crowded environment - SLAM, Python/C++, ROS, Gazebo

    Frontier Exploration -ROS,Gazebo,Rviz

    Roadmap Based Robot Motion Planning in Dynamic Environments - PRM, Python

    Design and Simulation of LQR (Linear Quadratic Regulator) Controller for a gantry crane - Control Theory, MATLAB

    Zoomba Roomba Robot - ROS,Gazebo,Rviz

    Modelling of fruit picking robot - MATLAB, Solidworks

    Object detection using YOLO algorithm - OpenCV,Python

    Implementation of Traffic Sign Detection and Classification using MSER and SVM Model - ML, OpenCV, Python

    House price prediction using machine learning techniques(Kaggle) - Python

    Implementation of Visual Odometry for estimating trajectory of robot - ORB/SIFT, Structure from Motion, Python

    Color segmentation using Gaussian Mixture Models and Expectation Maximization Techniques - OpenCV,Python

    Design of Algorithm for Lane Detection and Turn Prediction used in Self Driving Cars - OpenCV, Python

    Detection and Tracking of AR Tags using Homography and Pose Estimation - OpenCV, Python
